channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-cls-attr-order (0.3)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to check class attributes order
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-type-checking (1.3.3)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-assignment-expressions (1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin that disallows assignment expressions
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: wemake-python-styleguide (0.16.1)

item.title: Updated: flake8-cls-attr-order (0.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to check class attributes order

item.title: Updated: flake8-bandit (3)

item.title: New: flake8-debug (0.1.1)

item.title: New: flake8-async (22.3.10)
item.description: A flake8 plugin that checks bad async / asyncio practices

item.title: New: flake8-cached-frosty00 (0.0.4)
